summary: Custom Linda Blair follower for Familiar Faces by Verteiron.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://fbcdn-sphotos-d-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-xpa1/t1.0-9/10437689_929534743728756_6841301591006425165_n.jpg[/img]﻿

[size=4]DESCRIPTION:[/size]

This is my first attempt at a custom follower and rather than take on the challenge of the Creation Kit, I opted to create her for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54509/?]Familiar Faces[/url] mod by Verteiron. Thus, I present Linda, modeled after actress Linda Blair who is best known for the film, The Exorcist. She is a level 45 Imperial and made to use one-handed weapons and shields with light armor. Please let me know what you think and how I did. Criticism is welcome.

[color=#ffff00][b]PLEASE NOTE:[/b] The gear she wears in these pictures is [b]NOT [/b]what she will have upon installing. I instead rolled her back to vanilla gear for easier compatibility in case any problems arose.[/color]

[size=4]-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
[/size]
[img]https://fbcdn-sphotos-h-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-xap1/t1.0-9/10557430_929534773728753_1141216753214203948_n.jpg[/img]﻿

[size=5]REQUIREMENTS:
[/size]
-[size=4] Familiar Faces [/size]  by verteiron
- [size=4]SKSE 1.7.0 or Higher[/size]
- [size=4]SkyUI 4.1 or Higher[/size]   by schlangster
- [size=4]JContainers 0.67.4 or Higher  [/size] by silvericed
- [b][size=4]Racemenu 2.8.3 or higher[/size][/b]   by expired6978

[size=5]RECOMMENDED COSMETIC MODS:
[/size]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]CBBE[/url]﻿ by Caliente.
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]﻿ by Apachii.
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrows[/url]﻿ by HelloSanta.
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/689/?]Detailed Lips[/url]﻿ by Xenius.
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30/?]No More Blocky Faces[/url]﻿ by Xenius.
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29791/?]No More Ugly Bronze Shine[/url]﻿ by COTS.
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5812/?]RANs Eyebrows[/url]﻿ by RAN46.
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url]﻿ by Gabriel[b] Mailhot.
[/b]
[color=#ffff00][size=4]RECOMMENDED FF VOICE SETTING: Female Condescending. But it's up to you. :)
[/size][/color]
[img]https://scontent-b-atl.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-xfp1/t1.0-9/10559822_929534757062088_4528285020173957979_n.jpg[/img]﻿
[i][color=#f4cccc]"It's too bad you're not double-jointed... because if you were you could bend over and kiss your ass goodbye."
[/color][/i]- Linda as Brenda from "Savage Streets"
author: robinkom
